name: Survival of the Next
description:
Run, Jump, Glide, die then start again, but this time you evolved.

Run faster, Jump higher, Glide longer and more.

Death is not the end in "Survival of the Next", it's an essential part of "Evolution". In this 2D-Platformer, Jump'n'Run, you play an infant race that emerges in the ruins of a lost civilization and searches for a safe place to life. 

This is not a single hero mission, it is part of a generational journey of exploring and adaptation. Whenever the played character dies, you can choose a new kinfolk that evolved to be more fitting to the challenge.

If the mission failed, because they weren't fast enough, then the next one will be. If they couldn't jump high enough, then their ancestors grew a stronger tail to catapult them into the sky. If they don't have the right tools for the job, then natural selection will help them out by forming their bodies to fit the task.
This is the morbid, but crucial way of nature in "Survival of the Next", but the fundamentals for a unique Platforming experience.

___________________________________________________________________________

Controls:

A, D - Move left and Right

Space - Jump
- Glide in the AIr

LMB - Shoot
 - Aim with W, A, S, D while Shooting

________________________________________________________________________________

This game was created in 72 hours as submission of the "Alpha Summer Gamejam 2022" and with the theme "Evolution".
